name: Chain Dungeon
description:
Roguelike with 2048 mechanics.

Features:

* 3 monsters

* Items:
  - coins
  - sword
  - fireball

* Daily bonus

Update 1:
- Now after picking up an item it will be added to inventory, to use it, press slot
- New effects
- Some fixes

Controls: 

PC: left, right, up, down -to move; lmb - to shoot fireball

Android: swipes; press on any mob to shoot fireball at it
